attributes.action: remove the responsibility of telephone lines from british telecom to stop the monopoly they hold by SQUEEZING broadband supplied by opposing companies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that bt have to much of a hold over the telephone lines and is squeezing opponents on broadband speeds in favour of their own customers, i believe that British Telecom should give up the hold they have on the network (similar to british gas when their pipe work was taken over by transco)  i feel that this would open up the networks for a more competative market and would benefit everyone overall
